description: Retrieves information about the EC2 instances in an Amazon GameLift managed fleet, including instance ID, connection data, and status. You can use this operation with a multi-location fleet to get location-specific instance information. As an alternative, use the operations https://docs.aws.amazon.com/gamelift/latest/apireference/API_ListCompute and https://docs.aws.amazon.com/gamelift/latest/apireference/API_DescribeCompute to retrieve information for compute resources, including EC2 and Anywhere fleets. You can call this operation in the following ways: Use the pagination parameters to retrieve results as a set of sequential pages. If successful, this operation returns Instance objects for each requested instance, listed in no particular order. If you call this operation for an Anywhere fleet, you receive an InvalidRequestException. Remotely connect to fleet instances. Debug fleet issues. All APIs by task.

parameters.name: FleetId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the fleet to retrieve instance information for. You can use either the fleet ID or ARN value.

nested_items.name: Instances
nested_items.description: A collection of objects containing properties for each instance returned.

nested_items.name: FleetId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the fleet that the instance belongs to.

nested_items.name: FleetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name ( ARN) that is assigned to a Amazon GameLift fleet resource and uniquely identifies it. ARNs are unique across all Regions. Format is arn:aws:gamelift:<region>::fleet/fleet-a1234567-b8c9-0d1e-2fa3-b45c6d7e8912.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the instance.

nested_items.name: IpAddress
nested_items.description: IP address that is assigned to the instance.

nested_items.name: DnsName
nested_items.description: The DNS identifier assigned to the instance that is running the game session. Values have the following format:

nested_items.type: See Amazon EC2 Instance IP Addressing.
nested_items.description: Non-TLS-enabled fleets: ec2-<unique identifier>.compute.amazonaws.com. (See Amazon EC2 Instance IP Addressing.)

nested_items.name: OperatingSystem
nested_items.description: Operating system that is running on this EC2 instance.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: EC2 instance type that defines the computing resources of this instance.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Current status of the instance. Possible statuses include the following:

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp indicating when this data object was created. Format is a number expressed in Unix time as milliseconds (for example "1469498468.057").

nested_items.name: Location
nested_items.description: The fleet location of the instance, expressed as an Amazon Web Services Region code, such as us-west-2.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token that indicates where to resume retrieving results on the next call to this operation. If no token is returned, these results represent the end of the list.
